content: Resale HDB Property CPF AMA 1M65 Asked by Nicholas ChanAsked on 07 Nov 2018Hi Loo, many may not want to transfer OA to SA because they might want to upgrade swelling in future. U don't plan to move out of your hdb?1 answerAnswerBump1
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loo Cheng Chuan, Founder at 1M65 MovementLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Nov 2018One of the biggest hindrances to the 1M65 dream is the property dream that competes directly with it. As I have shared earlier, I also do not believe Property as a good investment tool. Hence, I do not plan to move out of my HDB as I am very comfortable living in one. Staying in a private property such as a Condominium will only have served to derail my plans to get rich.0 comments2
